rules.description: Email alert on opt out
Email alert on hard-bounce
Update the support email of uB office where the Contact Owner is located.

rules.fullName: Contact%3A AssistNow Support uB Office update
rules.description: This is used to update AssistNow Support Email.
Send the notifications to u-blox Contact Owner and support address. Fill the requested date and time in MGA Requested Date.
rules.formula: AND( /* 2019.02.13 khir commented out below that caused not sending the token */ /* ISCHANGED(MGA__c), */ MGA__c, ISCHANGED(MGA_Token__c), NOT(ISNULL(MGA_Token__c)) )

rules.description: Send the notifications to u-blox Contact Owner, support address and SVC POS Team Reigate.
Send the notifications to u-blox Contact Owner, support address and SVC POS Team Reigate.
Made to be triggered when AssistNow Enable button was pressed while the token is already available and to be re-sent.
When flag Email Invalid is removed, copy the Email Invalid date to the previous email invalid date, then clear the date.
When flag Email Invalid is removed, copy the "Date Email Invalid" to "Last Date Email Invalid".
Update the field with the date when Email Invalid has been checked.

rules.fullName: Contact%3A Last Date Email Invalid update
rules.description: Copy Date Email Invalid to Last Date Email Invalid and clear Date Email Invalid
For Lead conversion of News subscription
For Lead conversion of News subscription
When Left company is ticked, remove this flag.
Remove "Reactivate Email Address" checkbox when both "Email invalid" and "Email Opt Out" have become empty.

rules.description: Send email with URL to e-LULA-M. khir: changed from "AND(ISCHANGED(e_LULA_M__c),e_LULA_M__c=true)"

rules.fullName: Contact%3A clear subscriptions when leaving or unsubscribing
rules.description: Clears all subscriptions when the customer has left the company or has unsubscribed.
Send alert when an internal user opted out or email address is invalid

rules.fullName: Mailing Address update - Visiting Address changed in Account
rules.description: Copies address elements from the Account visiting address to the mailing address whenever the flag "Contact.Visiting_Address_changed__c" is set by the APEX Class AccountVisitingAddress

rules.fullName: Mailing Address update - after click on %22Same as Account Visiting Address%22 in Contact
rules.description: Copies address elements from the Account visiting address to the mailing address after manual setting the flag "Same as Account Visiting Address"
